I am a computational biologist, member of the [Systems Immunology Laboratory](https://sysimm.org) and leader of the [Quantitative Immunology Research Unit](http://qimm.ifrec.osaka-u.ac.jp) at the [Immunology Frontier Research Center](http://www.ifrec.osaka-u.ac.jp/en/), [Osaka University](http://www.osaka-u.ac.jp/en/). My interests include systems immunology, and gene regulatory networks.
